swapToken(address,address,uint256,addres.details: swap tokens, owner of swap contract need the approval of both token owners, emit an event called TokenExchanged

params.sellerAddress: the address of the seller, sellerTokenAddress the address of the seller ERC-20, amountSeller the amount the seller wants to exchange, buyerAddress the buyer address, buyerTokenAddress the adress of the buyer ERC-20, amountBuyer the amount to be exchanged

swapToken(address,address,uint256,addres.return: an event TokenExchanged containing the seller address, the buyer address, the amount sold and the amount bought in this order
